reviews.title: I love this fan and it works great!!
reviews.review_text: I really like the size of this fan. It's small enough to fit in a large purse of tote bag without taking up a lot of space. It has three speeds and can sit on a table-top or be hung from a hook. I also like that it runs off USB or 4 AA batteries for easy mobility. A friend of mind had this and I had to have one. Also purchased one as a future gift for someone. LOVE IT!!!

reviews.title: Mainstays New 4" On-the-Go Folding Personal Fan
reviews.review_text: I have wrote a comment three times, keeps getting knocked off. Love this fan, bring with us on our away from home, can use batteries or electricity. Perfect fan for standing up or putting on items to keep two people comfortable with air ventilation in high speed. Only complaint, I ordered two, took seven days to find out, there was a problem, will only receive one. Still happy to get one, but disappointed in Walmart's accountability for available. Definitely grade this portable fan a 10. Will wait next year to get one more. Compactible to carry with me on motorcycle trips staying overnight in hotels.

reviews.title: Great little fan
reviews.review_text: Perfect personal fan. It kept me going when the A/C quit, with temps in the high 90s. I like that it's adjustable and multi-speed.

reviews.title: Sturdy fan that blows out nice cool air
reviews.review_text: The settings blow out nice cool air, even on low. I bought this for my mama to use by her bed at night as she has occasional hot flashes and this is much easier than getting up out of bed to turn on the ceiling fan, with this she can cut on and off and adjust as needed. I like the sturdiness of the stand, no worries with it falling back or over. It stays in place exactly how you adjust it. I also like how the power button is in the front. The one I have has the power in the back and have to turn it over to power on. With this option, makes it much easier to turn off and on while in bed and go right back to sleep üò¥ üí§! Also, the usb plug comes with the wall outlet plug and I have even used the usb plug without the wall plug, in my computer and the fan came right on! You can also use 4 AA batteries to use on the go. Not sure how long it would last on the batteries but definitely a good option to use if needed while out and about. For $14, this is definitely more than what we expected and hope it lasts a good long while. The only thing I dont like is that sometimes the power cord comes out just slightly, just barely out of the socket so you have to make sure it is all the way pushed in or else it will not power on. The first time using, we thought it was malfunctioning, but since we discovered that it has to be all the way in, I mean like no space whatsoever in between lol, it comes right on!

Rayovac AA batteries will not fit! I taped cover to hold down but 1 battery leaked, end broke creating hot outside compartment cover! (great value did but only lasted 6 hrs)I didnt try usb plug in. It did keep blowing air in sun porch where ppl smoke to keep from staying still in air, humid weather. As the batteries are dying remember the control button will only work on 2 then 1 then out!

I was looking for a small fan to put on my bedside for white noise. This fan has a light where the button is I didn't care for that and the sound of the fan was not what I was looking for I will be returning item.

reviews.title: NOT RECHARGABLE üò´
reviews.review_text: I didn't realize that it needed batteries. I thought it was rechargeable. I wanted to put it inside the stroller to keep my baby cool. He is only four months. I'm worried about him overheating. Now I have to buy batteries. You can only use it with a cord or with batteries. The necklace fans are great because they're rechargeable, but that's only good for mom. because I can't get the angle right to put it in the stroller. it's dangerous for a baby to be around strings. I will have to go buy some rechargeable batteries because I already threw away the packaging thinking it was rechargeable.

Turning on and staying on‚Ä¶that didn't really happen!! Once I put in the Batteries, they wouldn't stay in ‚Äútheir assigned seating‚Äù lol and kept popping out causing trouble to close it properly. And because of this the fan wouldn't stay on for more than 30 seconds to a minute.

reviews.title: Won't work!
reviews.review_text: If I could give 0 stars, the fan we got won't even work, we got it for my daughter on the go while for when we go to the zoo I put in the batteries to test it, the batteries just fly out won't stay in and it won't even turn on no matter the order the batteries are placed. It was basically a waste of money and wasn't even what we originally wanted but what we wanted wasn't in stock apparently.

reviews.title: disappointed
reviews.review_text: stayed on 5 minutes with brand new batteries and the adapter and "plug" weren't in the box. obviously, I'll be returning it

very good. small but that's the idea, three speeds so you can get a good amount of air even when not on the go. folds down, usb so that's handy. i think it has battery option too, I'll have to check. neat simple. nothing really to dislike
works great. kepts me cool at work. i like that you can use batteries or the usb. it even comes with a box not just the cord.

reviews.title: Cool disappointment
reviews.review_text: The fans worked great and then when they needed charged they only Run now when on the charger. I thought it was just a flook but I bought the teal and a white one and they both do it. Very disappointed. My kids planned to use these on our trips in the car.

reviews.title: Mini fan
reviews.review_text: item stopped working after a few uses! Used cheap batteries at first not compatible batteries seemed to be cut bigger for battery compartment. Bought Duracell batteries and after less than an hour fan stopped working, had to use cord (included with fan). eventually the tip of usb cord came detached, had to use a substitute. pro: fan blow out a nice amount of Air but fan stopped working for unknown reason. üòêü´§üßê
Nice fan, works great. It does tip over easily though.

reviews.title: Must buy
reviews.review_text: This fan is awesome! I love the fact that it has 3 speeds. Keeps me cool on hot nights at work.

reviews.title: nice but not powerful enough
reviews.review_text: nice fan for an office but not powerful enough for keeping me cool in this Florida heat.
This little fan is fantastic. I absolutely love it. It's worth every penny.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: This fan eats thru batteries like crazy. Even using a usb charger box. It won't stay on very long. Disappointed
I didn't expect the glow to be as powerful as it was. Must get !!

reviews.title: This is perfect for the blazing hot Vegas summer!
reviews.review_text: I brought this to work at the hospital and have shared the link with several coworkers. It's versatile and gets the job done. Worth it's weight in gold when it's 120F outside!

reviews.title: Cool Breeze
reviews.review_text: This mainstays on the go folding fan is the perfect size. It is small enough to fit in a purse or diaper bag. You can carry it, sit it up or even hang it up. It runs on 4 AA batteries or you can use the USB ac adapter. I love that it has 3 different speed settings. Even on the lowest it gives a nice little breeze. I recommend this for anyone with a baby or small children when you go anywhere outside in the heat. It works a lot better than the smaller stroller fans.
I thought it was a floor fan is a little bitty one, but I used to fill my car.What no air conditioner yeah thanks

reviews.title: Good for the hot months
reviews.review_text: I used this in the Caribbean. The car I was using had no AC, luckily i brought this with me on my trip. You can charge it with a USB. There are three modes, and the light gets brighter the higher it gets. On the highest mode I was able to feel cool in the hot car, yes the air was hot but felt good.

reviews.title: Wonderful little fan
reviews.review_text: This little fan is going to be so handy. I can see my kids will be borrowing it- for their desks or outside in the hammock while reading on a hot day. It's nice that I can plug it in to my computer and use that way, but the battery option makes it so much more versatile. A few fan speeds makes it darn near perfect

reviews.title: On-the-Go Folding Fan
reviews.review_text: This mini folding fan can best be described as small but mighty. At less than 8 inches tall, it is ideal for use at a desk or table. It has a powerful air flow in 3 different speeds. This fan can also be hung using the attached folding handles. There are two sources of power: 4 AA batteries or the included USB cord and adapter. An added feature is the lighted power button.

reviews.title: Perfect for Travel
reviews.review_text: The Mainstays On-The-Go Folding Fan in white has many great features. The folding handle is also the stand and the hanger. So you can carry it, hang it or stand it. The Mainstays On-The-Go Folding Fan is multi-powered and runs on 4 AA batteries or a USB power cord with an AC plug-in adapter. The USB port in on the back of the fan above the battery compartment.The Mainstays On-The-Go Folding Fan has a 3.5 inch diameter blade which is actually fairly quiet and powerful. The USB power cord is 59 inches long which gives you more maneuverability to place the fan where you need it most. The On-The-Go Folding Fan can be taken anywhere. I do not know how long the batteries will last (# of hours on different speeds)but with the USB power cord and a portable/or solar power bank you can have unlimited power. Unfortunately the USB does not charge the batteries. The Mainstays On-the-Go Folding Fan is great as a personal fan, work station fan or for camping, setting on the pic-nic table, using to cool the tent in the evening etc. The On-The-Go Folding Fan is small enough to fit in a purse or backpack yet powerful enough to have 3 speeds. The blue lighted ring around the power button gets brighter with each speed. The Mainstays On the Go Folding fan is extremely portable, but it's the best mini fan I have seen on the market. An awesome Mother's Day/Father's Day gift. Perfect for anyone any day.

reviews.title: Great air flow for a small fan
reviews.review_text: This is a great desk fan. Could work in an office or in the garage on your work station. I personally use it when I'm jumproping! I set it up in the garage nearest me so that I am vooled off as I excercise but I suppose you can use it for whatever purpose works best for you. It gives off good air flow, has three settings, when i excercise I use the third and strongest setting but at my office desk upstairs I have to keep it on the first setting or its too cold. Highly recommend

reviews.title: Foldaway Fan Collapsible
reviews.review_text: I bought this little fan on a road trip in Lulling, TX. So far I used 1 night at a hotel in Austin, TX. Then again in Dallas, TX for 3 nights in a Hotel. I like it very much because I always need air & my wife is always cold. It gives me enough air to fall asleep. Don't expect it to blow you away it is just comfortable. I can't say about how long it will last, but I love that it is a small & can pack in my bag without taking much space and light. Save the box to put it away for road trips I wouldn't use this as a daily use fan to go to sleep with. I would buy this again even thinking of buying this for some Christmas stocking stuffers. Runs off 4 AA battery not included. and or a type c cord and wall plug which is included.

reviews.title: Batteries, plugin outlet, powerbank, c port
reviews.review_text: Dual powered. Four AA batteries or plug into wall. The power cord is a c type so im sure you can get a power bank to use it as well. That would be useful for when the power goes out or someone who camps. This fan is so versatile. It can sit up or hang. Its made for many situations. No noise whatsoever.

reviews.title: Really nice small fan
reviews.review_text: Iteuly didn't expect much from this small 4 inch Mainstays foldable fan but I absolutely love it. It is currently winter here and I have it on its lowest setting hanging and circulating hot air around my house. I love the breeze level and the option to hang or stand it. It is incredibly light weight. If you work in an office and want a quiet but actually functional personal fan, this is it.

reviews.title: Perfect for what I need
reviews.review_text: This mini fan is perfect for using on my desk and workspace. I love that it's collapsible and I can easily store in a drawer . There are three different settings on the fan. Which comes in handy. I would totally recommend for someone especially if they get warm regularly.

reviews.title: Loving this Fan!
reviews.review_text: This fan is small. But I can feel the air about 5-6 feet away. It would be great for taking to work with you because it's very small. It'd fit down in a woman's big purse or tote bag. Also would be great sitting on a desk. I have mine sitting on the dryer to blow air from the utility area window AC to the kitchen. I did take a pic of an ink pen and pencil cup to show the size. I would recommend this to anyone that needs a small fan to sit on a table or in a bedroom on a night fan to help circulate the air.

reviews.title: Ideal Size to Use Anywhere
reviews.review_text: Great little personal fan! It offers three speeds-- all that blow a decent amount of air. It's also very quiet!! Can be used with USB or batteries. Perfect for taking it anywhere. You can place it in several different positions or it can be hung. It's an ideal little personal fan!!

reviews.title: Excellent for work desk!
reviews.review_text: Excellent little personal fan for a work desk. I like that it comes in fun colors. The fan does make a sound that gets louder when you increase power, but it's not very loud. It didn't bother me while I was working, and i couldn't hear it on my calls. I like that you can plug it in or use batteries. Quality is excellent! Highly recommend!

reviews.title: The Amazing Small Fan
reviews.review_text: The folder personal fan has exceeded my expectations. Its compact design makes carrying it from place to place quite easy. I love the multiple folding options that allows for versatility for what every position needed at the time and the adjustable speed setting help me to control the noise level in the room.

reviews.title: Great Little Fan
reviews.review_text: This fan is perfect for me! I am always getting too hot while using my laptop. It is usually on my lap and the motor heat makes it too warm, so I have to stop what I'm doing and put the laptop on a pillow to continue using it. Now, I just turn on my Mainstay on-the-go fan and the nice little breeze cools me off. I love it. It's quiet and doesn't blow all of my paper everywhere.

reviews.title: Great Portable Fan
reviews.review_text: This small, portable fan is super nice white noise & air movement for me. I love the sound of it whirring quietly while I sleep at home & will definitely be taking this on trips in our motorhome, as well as hotel stays (as sometimes hotel fans do not have a constant fan on setting) The blue light, on the power button, brightens with each higher setting (3 speed settings). It is very bright on the highest setting (I do not like that while I sleep). I put a piece of tape over it to not have that. This is a nice fan & can stand to be plugger in or hust battery powered (FANTASTIC option for tent camping for me)

reviews.title: Great Hot Flash relief weapon.
reviews.review_text: This is the coolest gadget fan. It's got the ability to hang from my light, or hang in my shed. I set it on the counter when it's not hanging around. It's great cause I can charge it with usb or use it with batteries. It's a great aesthetic blue shade. This will serve many a hot flash day!

reviews.title: Love This Quiet Travel Fan
reviews.review_text: Love this fan! It's very lightweight even with 4 AA batteries inserted. It can stand or hang. You can power it with a USB cord that's included. It has 3 speeds and easily adjusts by pressing the button. What I really like is the quiet operation. I can use this on a plane without getting stares from the noise. This fan is great for travel, camping, at home, or where ever you need a quick cool down! Love it!

reviews.title: Love this flip fan! Great for on the go!
reviews.review_text: This mainstay flip on the go fan is great to take with you where ever you go and needing alittle air. This fan can be easily carried, its portable can run by usb or batteries, which are not included. The fan has three speeds and the air feels great! This little fan small but powerful and will meet your needs. Mine came in a turquoise color which I like, the fan comes in other colors as well. I love the design which makes it easy to sit up or hang if needed. I have enjoyed this fan will be great for a desk at home or work area. I would definitely recommend to friends and family.

reviews.title: The size is perfect!
reviews.review_text: The On-the-Go Multi-powered Folding Fan in White is a summer savior! This little fan has become my trusty companion during hot days, and I'm loving it. The folding design is a game-changer. It easily fits into my bag making it the ultimate on-the-go cooling solution. Perfect for those impromptu beach trips or outdoor events.

reviews.title: Awesome fan!
reviews.review_text: Small but mighty! Outstanding fan and perfect for your desk, night stand or where ever you might need a breeze. Three speed options, along with three power options; battery, usb or electrical plug. It isn't too loud so I can use it at my desk while on a zoom call.

reviews.title: Amazing little fan!
reviews.review_text: This little fan is incredibly useful to me! I'm one of those people who can not sleep with total silence. I have to have the humming of a fan to help me sleep. And this is perfect for when I'm traveling! I really like that you have two options for the power supply. Batteries or plug in!

reviews.title: Small but mighty, quiet and useful!
reviews.review_text: On to the go! Don't think you can charge & take with you, I made that mistake. You can plug in to your wall, car, even your battery adapter or use 4 AA batteries. Has a lot of power for only 4 inches. Has 5 spinning blades. Quiet! Sits on a moveable handle that can go completely flat if needed. 3 power settings that are shown by a small blue circle led light on the front. I'm a high fan of the Mainstays fans especially living in a hot humid state. I rely on them all year long inside my home. This is one I'll be grabbing for as I leave the home! Sometimes I use it inside my dishwasher to help dry my dishes faster. Bonus use idea!

reviews.title: Great fan for the desk or for traveling
reviews.review_text: There's a lot to like about this little fan. I'll start with the positives. First, I love that it can be powered with a USB. This makes it so versatile. With nearly every small device being powered with USB in today's world, that makes this fan able to be powered in the home, vehicles, campers, etc. You could even power it with a portable USB power bank (see pic), making it very travel or camping friendly. Second, you're also able to power it with 4 AA batteries, which makes it versatile (not recommended, see below). Other positives include the portable size, the light weight design, and the stand is adjustable and stiff, meaning, you can alter the angle or direction of the fan. Now the negatives. First, using AA batteries does not last very long. I used AC Delco batteries (not the best, but still good quality batteries), and the fan lasted about 3 hours when on full. Second, there are 3 speeds, however, the first speed seems to hardly move the air. You need your face to be right next to the fan to feel the moving air. I can't really think of many uses for having the fan on the lowest setting. The fan is small enough that you almost always need it on the highest speed to be effective. Overall, I would recommend this fan. If you're a traveler, enjoy camping (in either the tent or camper), or need a little desk fan while you work, this is perfect for you. Just make sure you can power it via the USB rather than AA batteries, otherwise you'll burn through batteries quick.

reviews.title: Comes with every thing you need
reviews.review_text: This little fan might be small but it was more powerful than I thought it would be. It has three speeds. You can hang it, stand it, or carry it. It's small enough to fit in a larger size purse, or regular size backpack and easily in any tote. It can be used with batteries or a USB cord that is included. It didn't tip open when I set it up! That's a huge plus. Very sturdy stand.

reviews.title: Awesome little fan
reviews.review_text: This is an awesome little portable fan. It has 3 power modes. Even on the highest mode it's still fairly quiet. I love that you have the option of batteries or the USB. The cord it comes with is quite long which is nice. I absolutely love that it's foldable and that you can hang it or stand it up. It looks nice and blends in nicely too. My husband has used it in his office while working, we've hung it in our cabinets under the sink to dry out a spill, and my kids are excited to use it in their treehouse when the weather gets warm. Great to have.

reviews.title: 4inch Foldable fan
reviews.review_text: I got the Mainstays 4 Inch Foldable Personal Fan. It can run with USB plugged in which is included or batteries which are not included. It has 3 speeds and really works well. I like that you can have it sit up or can even hang it. I got the teal color and really like it. Its not noisy and is just right size for me to put near desk at work.

reviews.title: Very portable
reviews.review_text: This little personal fan is so practical!! You can use batteries 4 AA or usb cable with plug in which is provided, batteries are not included. 3 speeds and can go anywhere!! You can hang it or place it on a flat surface. Would be great for camping in a tent as it‚Äôs very portable.

reviews.title: Not even one summer
reviews.review_text: I ordered this in March, and in June it just quits. I mean come on.
I read rechargeable and not the part that said batteries required

reviews.title: Perfect for camping
reviews.review_text: Lightweight and has the option to run on battery or be plugged in. Great value for the price

reviews.title: wow
reviews.review_text: This fan was spray painted sooo poorly that i couldnt even push the button to start it. my husband laughed so hard at how bad it looked and sent pictures to his friends.

reviews.title: Mini fan
reviews.review_text: It's a nice product actually works blows out air great has three different settings it's just really smaller than what I expected it to be was looking forward to it being at least medium size but for great product would recommend

reviews.title: great lil fan!
reviews.review_text: nice desktop fan that is great for the office or your bedroom. creates a nice quiet fan noise that is easy to fall asleep to. recommended if you are an office worker or need a little white noise to sleep.

reviews.title: Quiet, compact, breezy
reviews.review_text: This is a great little fan and perfect to use at your desk. The different speeds are nice and it's pretty quiet for the amount of breeze it produces. It's also very compact which is great for storage

reviews.title: Minstays 4 inch mini fan
reviews.review_text: The mainstay foldable personal fan I used it every day in my home at my desk because something it is very hot in my home. It is so cute I love it and it is very easy to used and also travel with the fan.

reviews.title: Nice!!
reviews.review_text: Since it's been below zero here the last few days, I'm not needing a fan right now, BUT this summer this little jewel is going to be great!! Light weight, small but still delivers a lot of air. I love it!!!

reviews.title: Amazing Little Fan
reviews.review_text: This little fan is amazing. I can use it everywhere. It folds down compact to fit in my bag. It can run on battery or usb plug. Great to use in the car, home, camping, by the pool,etc. It can set on the table or use the stand to hang it up.

reviews.title: Great Fan for travel
reviews.review_text: The fan is perfect for my son to take with him to summer camp. The fan is super easy to pack bc it easily folds flat. It takes batteries or can be charged and it has three different fan speeds as well.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.review_text: It's perfect for personal use and easy to take on travels. The fan stand reverses to become a handle which makes the fan also versatile. This fan is great to use on airplanes and is also perfect for outside ballgames. I love it so much.

reviews.title: Great travel fan
reviews.review_text: This fan is a perfect size for camping, use on an office desk, or any outdoor games. This fan can be plugged in or uses 4 double A batteries. The fan has 3 speed settings and can be hung up or use the attached stand.

reviews.title: Small but mighty!
reviews.review_text: Love that this little fan is so powerful! Love that it works off battery or usb. The stand can be moved up or lowered and doesnt tip over, the perfect little desk fan that doesnt take up so much space and its also very quiet!

reviews.title: Good portable fan!
reviews.review_text: This Mainstays fan is portable which works so well for strollers, golf carts, or just sitting out where there is no electricity. The batteries do last for a few hours. The power is strong and the different speeds are perfect.

reviews.title: Great for the office
reviews.review_text: This fan is so great for my office! I keep it on my desk. Its perfect for the small space! It is very quiet and gives off just the perfect amount of air to keep me cool on those random warm days. It looks nice and not too bulky.

reviews.title: Little but powerful
reviews.review_text: This fan may be little but it‚Äôs powerful and serves it purpose. Super easy to use and great for a quick cool down by popping the bottom up for the stand. Highly recommended for a desk fan, no issues at all.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: Handy little fan for the office. I appreciated the usb power option so that I can easily connect it to my PC or use an adapter to plug in. The 3 speeds are nice to have and I found the low to be more than adequate.
The charger it comes with does not charge it, I had to use batteries. But other than that great fan especially for work.

reviews.title: Don't buy it
reviews.review_text: It worked one time. Will turn on then off right away, with brand new batteries. The charging port never worked. Absolutely do not recommend.

reviews.title: Great little fan for a great price.
reviews.review_text: I did not expect a fan this inexpensive to work so well. I love that it has 3 power options so you can plug it into the wall, into USB, or run it on batteries. Great to have a battery option for tent camping but able to run on AC or USB when you can. I also love the folding handle design. You can angle it however you need and it doesn't tip over. Great for a work desk to blow the air where you need it and not blow papers around. The 3 speed options are great, I have used all 3 at different times. This is my 2nd summer using this fan and it is still working well. Just ordered another one so I can leave one at work.

reviews.title: Make sure you have AA batteries if you buy this
reviews.review_text: I had purchased this little fan to replace another one that I had and could no longer find a similar model to that I use on my breaks at work during the summer. Since it had to fit into my backpack the replacement fan had to be small enough and lightweight enough to fit into my backpack. Which this one did. Granted I bought this on a Saturday and I am writting this on a Sunday so I havent had a chance to test it at work but so far it seems to be powerful enough to work the way I need it to. But thank goodness I tested this at home before trying it at work. Since it will only work if you have it either plugged into an power source or if you have AA batteries in it. If I hadnt tested it at home first I would not have known this and therefore I would not have had the AA batteries in it when I went to work. Nor would I have had the cord and or piece to plug it into an electrical socket. As I work in a large warhouse that is hard to air condition having a little fan like this one is sometimes the only thing that helps to get me though the day. I am still debating about returning this and getting my money back.
lightweight %26 packs easily. less bulk than other fans I have used for travel.

reviews.title: Personal fan
reviews.review_text: Love this fan convenient and cools well on all levels

reviews.title: Surprised!
reviews.review_text: Very satisfied! Latger than I expected. Puts out nice breeze. Only thing, is a little loud.

reviews.title: Stopped blowing all 3 speeds same day
reviews.review_text: The fan caught on fire after a week of having it

reviews.title: 3 speeds and batteries lasts
reviews.review_text: stand part broke quickly although still functional, fan works well and batteries last. great for summer camp

reviews.title: Not worth it
reviews.review_text: It does not work, no matter how you stand it or hang it, if you connected or put batteries in it, it will work when it wants too and for a few seconds.

reviews.title: Great fan bad battery life
reviews.review_text: This fan is small, powerful and quiet. If using AA batteries , pack extra. I can't make it through one work day with the battery lasting using it on and off for around 6. Not even with extended life lithium batteries .

reviews.title: Great fan
reviews.review_text: This little life saver comes in handy when you loose power from storms. I also suggest you keep rechargeable batteries handy too. I have several of each in my hurricane box.

reviews.title: iffy
reviews.review_text: this was a great fan at first but now it doesn't go past the second speed after n hour it wouldn't go past the first speed without dying so im returning it

reviews.title: Turned itself off using batteries
reviews.review_text: I bought for hurricane season to use because of battery operated choice. The fan stopped operating after a short period. It turned itself off. I turned on again next day and it did the same thing‚Ä¶ plus it only had 2 speeds instead of 3.
I needed a small fan for work. Don't let the size fool you. It gets the job done. It has three different settings and blows a cool breeze.

reviews.title: Will last for short term!
reviews.review_text: You'll love it at first then the motor will stop working. Pay attention to all the positive reviews were from people who were given the fan for free.
